poc_systemloesungen.title: POC System Solutions
poc_systemloesungen.description: Your diagnostic control center. Mobile analyzers delivering lab-accurate results in minutes, directly at the point of care (e.g., Igloo Pro).

praeventions_checks.title: Preventive Health Checks
praeventions_checks.description: Prevention reimagined. Rapid determination of key biomarkers (e.g., Vitamin D, CRP, HbA1c) for early risk detection and individual health counseling.

infektion_entzuendung.title: Infection & Inflammation Markers
infektion_entzuendung.description: Fast answers in critical cases. Immediate analysis of inflammation levels (CRP, PCT, IL-6) and infectious diseases – essential for acute care and triage.

stoffwechsel_herz.title: Metabolism & Heart Health
stoffwechsel_herz.description: Key indicators at a glance. Precise measurement of HbA1c, cholesterol profiles, and cardiac markers (e.g., D-Dimer) for monitoring chronic conditions.

hormon_tests.title: Hormone & Endocrinology Tests
hormon_tests.description: Specialized diagnostics made easy. Wide range of tests for thyroid and reproductive hormones (TSH, AMH) for specialized practices and pharmacies.

kompatibilitaet_integration.title: Manufacturer-Independent Compatibility
kompatibilitaet_integration.description: Maximum flexibility. Thanks to universal technology, our devices evaluate 90% of all lateral flow tests on the market. Investment security through openness.

richard_pollock.title: Biological Dentist and Implant Surgeon / Chelsea Dental Clinic
richard_pollock.focus: Fast On-Site Health Checks (Prevention, Vitamin D)
richard_pollock.text: Carrying out analysis of Vitamin D levels and other key health indicators on-site cannot be underestimated. The Igloo Pro enables me to perform a simple capillary blood test, to ascertain patients’ needs and to then guide them as to which additional supplements they might require to optimise treatment. This capability is proving transformative in terms of patient outcomes.

eva_schmidt.title: Owner / Löwen-Apotheke, Berlin
eva_schmidt.focus: The next step in preventive counseling (Customer loyalty, Speed)
eva_schmidt.text: Since implementing the Igloo Pro system, our role as health advisors has strengthened significantly. Customers greatly appreciate being able to determine important values like CRP or cholesterol in minutes, rather than waiting weeks for appointments. A true win-win situation for customer loyalty and service quality.

martin_fischer.title: Specialist in Internal Medicine / Internal Practice Dr. Fischer
martin_fischer.focus: Immediate diagnostics for acute patients (Efficiency, Treatment decision)
martin_fischer.text: The ability to determine inflammation markers like CRP immediately in the practice has revolutionized our treatment workflow. We can decide faster whether antibiotic therapy is necessary for patients with unclear infections, preventing unnecessary referrals. This saves us time and significantly increases patient satisfaction.

julia_bergmann.title: Head of Lab & Diagnostics / Klinikum Nord
julia_bergmann.text: The Igloo Pro is the most flexible Point-of-Care device we have ever evaluated. The manufacturer-independent compatibility for lateral flow tests is a huge advantage, allowing us to standardize our POC devices and save costs without sacrificing the proven reliability of results.
